name: Paranormal: Multiplayer Horror
description:
Play scary survival horror game and experience the phobia of escaping from the ghost.

Paranormal Multiplayer Horror is an exciting game with complex riddles in a office haunted by the ghost. It will let you experience the thrill of horror films and you can play it in first person mode!.

You and your friends are in the office working at night shift. Suddenly lights go out and a terrifying entity haunts the building. You must solve the puzzles wit your friends and escape from the ghost in this crazy survival action game.

Game Features:

- Play either Single Player offline or Multiplayer game mode
- Online game mode with up to 4 survivors.
- Play with friends.
- Chat with your friends.

Enjoy this classic horror environment. Connect with random friends or invite your friends and share exciting adventures. Install now!.
